title: The companion section for classical groups
abstract:
We use the companion matrix construction for $\mathrm{GL}_n$ to build
canonical sections of the Chevalley map $[\mathfrak{g}/G]\to \mathfrak{g}/\!/
G$ for classical groups $G$ as well as the group $G_2$. To do so, we construct
canonical tensors on the associated spectral covers. As an application, we make
explicit lattice descriptions of affine Springer fibers and Hitchin fibers for
classical groups and $G_2$.
